item.title: Using Docker Compose
item.description: Preamble Nowadays, everyone’s favorite buzzword is “microservices”, and that’s very logical. In a microservices architecture, its easy to scale up separate services as need be. It’s a proven architecture pioneered by companies as Netflix. However, sometimes it can be tedious to take care of the separate services. That is why Docker was invented. What is Docker? Docker is a way of containerizing applications. A container is a way of “packing up” a piece of code along with its dependencies.
